Aug. 29, 1907 D Derby Contest
Derby Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
derby-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Drill Hall, Derby Choice of test piece: "Il Trovatore" or "Daughter of the Regiment" Prizes: £10, £6, £3, £2, £1. March contest - 1st Woodfield, 2nd Derby United. 5 bands competed.
April 6, 2012, 10:32 a.m. Sept. 20, 2018, 12:26 p.m.
1 Long Eaton Silver Prize Band George Hallam Daughter of the Regiment [unknown arranger]
2 Derby Sax and Tuba H. Little Daughter of the Regiment [unknown arranger]
3 Woodville United Angus Holden Il Trovatore [unknown arranger]
4 Derby United James Haywood Il Trovatore [unknown arranger]
5 Derby Keddleston Street T. A. Bailey Daughter of the Regiment [unknown arranger]
